title: IIMB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Technical Assistant Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Management Bangalore (IIMB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Technical Assistant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Post-graduation can apply for the IIMB Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, appl...
